column8: Pour the rum and ginger beer into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with the lemon twist.

column14: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the light rum añejo rum orange juice and lemon juice. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with the ginger ale. Garnish with the lemon twist.

column6: Shake ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

column10: Shake all ingredients (except for the cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

column8: Pour all of the ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

column14: Combine and shake all ingredients (except mint) with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add the sprig of mint and serve.

Stir all ingredients with ice strain contents into a cocktail glass and serve.

column10: Pour schnapps orange juice and cranberry juice over ice in a highball glass. Top with club soda and serve.

Shake all ingredients (except lime wedge) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the wedge of lime and serve.

column8: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

column10: Pour all ingredients (except for lemon juice) over ice in a highball glass. Stir add a dash of lemon juice and serve.
Stir all ingredients with ice strain contents into a cocktail glass. Drop in a twist of lemon and serve.

column10: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the gin creme de menthe and heavy cream. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the nutmeg.
